QueryText: fertilizer dose for groundnut
KccAns:
pply tnau mn mixture @ 12.5 kg /ha as enriched fym . (prepare enriched fym at 1:10 ratio of mn mixture & fym ; mix at friable moisture &incubate for one month in shade).
broadcast  evenly on the soil  surface  immediately  after  sowing.  do not  incorporate  the micronutrient mixture to the soil.
to increase flower retention, pod filling and to induce drought tolerance apart from yield improvement, 2 sprays of groundnut rich @ 5.0 kg/ha (for each spray) at 35 das ( 50 per cent flowering) and 45 das (pod developing stage) in 500 litres of water is recommended.

QueryText: tata taqat uses
KccAns: tata taqat uses : hexaconazole 5% + captan 70% wp it is a unique combination of contact & systemic mode of action.  it is a combination fungicide based on hexaconazole 5% and captan 70% as active ingredients in wp formulation.  it has good protective, curative, eradicant and anti sporulant mode of action.  it is a broad spectrum fungicide highly useful for management of powdery mildew, anthracnose, late blight, early blight, downy mildew & grey mildew diseases on fruits & vegetables and various other crops

QueryText: wild pigs management
KccAns: usage: mix 500ml ecodon in 40 litres of water to make a solution. dip a jute or cotton rope into this solution and tie it around the farm or garden. spray plain water onto this rope once in a week in order to retain moisture. wild pigs and rodents will run away unable to withstand the smell of ecodon solution

QueryText: groundnut gypsum application time
KccAns:
apply gypsum @ 400 kg/ha by the side of the plants on 40th to 70th day depending upon soil moisture.
apply gypsum, hoe and incorporate it in the soil and then earth up.
avoid gypsum in calciferous soils.
gypsum is effective in soils deficient in calcium and sulphur.
note: application of gypsum encourages pod formation and better filling up of the pods.

application of gypsum at the rate of 50 % basal both in rainfed and irrigated condition reduces khadhasty malady and pod scab nematode

QueryText: how to give sulphur to groundnut crop?
KccAns: apply gypsum @ 200 kg/acre at 40th to 45th day of sowing.

QueryText: irrigation details of ground nut
KccAns: recommended to give irrigation 24 hrs after appplication of weedicide

QueryText: groundnut fertilizer management (ammonium sulfate combined nutrient spray)
KccAns: recommended pod filling is a major problem especially in the bold seed varieties. to improve pod filling spraying of nutrient solution is to be given. this can be prepared by soaking dap 2.5 kg, ammonium sulphate 1 kg and borax 0.5 kg in 37 lit of water overnight. the next day morning it can be filtered and about 32 litre of mixture can be obtained and it may be diluted with 468 lit of water so as to made up to 500 litre to spray for one ha. plano fix at the rate of 350 ml. can also be mixed while spraying. this can be sprayed on 25th and 35th day after sowing.

QueryText: ground nut fertilizer  schedule management
KccAns: recommended to apply groundnut	basal dose: 2 bags ssp, 18kg urea, 33kg mop , 30days: 9kg urea             zypsum 200 kg per acre

QueryText: groundnut nematodes management
KccAns: recommended to apply carbofuran 3 g  granules  8-10 kg /acre

QueryText: leaf folder and tobacco caterpillars in ground nut
KccAns: recommended to spray thiodicarb 300 grams / 200 liters of water/ one acre.

QueryText: groundnut initial pest management
KccAns: recommended to apply urea 10 kilograms and gypsum 200 kilograms at first flowering stage.

QueryText: ground nut tobacco caterpillers management
KccAns: recommended to apply urea 10 kilograms and gypsum 200 kilograms at first flowering stage.

QueryText: ground nut post herbicide application
KccAns: recommended to spray imazitapyr  300 ml/200 litres of water  per acre

QueryText: basal  fertilizer application  dose
KccAns:
fertilizer recommendations:
apply 20n + 40 p2o5 + 50 k2o kg/ha as basal for kharif crop. phosphorus should be applied through single super phosphate. apply gypsum @ 500 kg /ha at flowering stage by placement. wherever zinc deficiency is observed, apply zinc sulphate 50 kg/ha once in 3 seasons.

avoid gypsum in calciferous soils.

QueryText: emamectin benzoate 5 sg uses in groundnut crop

QueryText: groundnut late leaf spot:management
KccAns:
intercropping pearl millet or sorghum with groundnut (1 : 3) is useful in reducing the intensity of late leafspot.
crop rotation with non-host crops preferably cereals.
deep burying of crop residues in the soil, removal of volunteer groundnut plants are important measures in reducing the primary source of infection.
spray carbendazim 0.1% or mancozeb 0.2% or chlorothalonil 0.2%.

ï‚·keep for 24 hrs, then filter squeeze the extract. this can be stored in bottles for 6 months.
ï‚·useful against sucking pests, pod/fruit borers.
ï‚·dilute 2-2.5 lit of this extract to 100 lit for 1 acre.

QueryText: farmer asked about pheromone traps uses to erect in groundnut ?
KccAns:
pheromone traps are very sensitive, meaning they attract insects present at very low densities. they are often used to detect presence of exotic pests, or for sampling, monitoring, or to determine the first appearance of a pest in an area.
pheromones have been successfully used in pest management through mass trapping and mating disruption techniques.keep 4-8 traps per acre

QueryText: how to preparewaste decomposer  ??
KccAns:
take 2 kg jiggery and mixed it in a plastic drum containing 200 liters water.
now take 1 bottle of waste decomposer and pour all its contents in a plastic drum containing jiggery drum.
mix it properly with a wooden stick for uniform distribution of waste decomposer in a drum.
cover the drum with a paper or cardboard and stir it every day once or twice.
after 5 days the solution of drum turns creamy.

QueryText: farmer asked query on rats control in ground nut

QueryText: farmer asked query about on  what is rhizobium ? how do plants benefit from rhizobium?
KccAns:
approximately 80% of the air is nitrogen gas, but it is not in a form that plants can use. legume plants, however, have the ability to form a relationship with a specific soil bacteria, rhizobia, which convert nitrogen gas from the air into a readily available form that can be used by the plant.
rhizobium biofertilizer
it is a biofertilizer that contains symbiotic rhizobium bacteria which is the most important nitrogen-fixing organism. these organisms have the ability to drive atmospheric nitrogen and provide it to plants.

QueryText: farmer asked query on tata metri herbicides (metribuzin 70% wp) uses
KccAns:
tata metri herbicide is an effective herbicide that has a metribuzin molecule that belongs to the triazine group, and it inhibits photosynthesis in photo-system ii.
metri herbicide works to control weeds in sugarcane, potato, tomato, soybean, and wheat.
tata metri herbicide (metribuzin 70% wp) acts through the roots and leaves and, therefore, can be used for pre-and post-emergence applications.
tata metri metribuzin controls both narrow and broadleaf weeds.
metribuzin effectively controls phalaris minor, which has developed resistance to most herbicides and many other types of grass and broadleaf weeds.
metribuzin is economical because of its broad-spectrum activity and low dose.
metri tata rallis leaves no residual effect on succeeding crops.
selective weeds are eradicated in sugarcane, potato, tomato, soybean, and wheat.

QueryText: groundnut wonder (organic plant growth enhancers) information ?

packing & dosage :

 

wonder granuels are available in 5 & 30kgs and also in bulk packing and the normal dosage of wonder granules is 5-10 kgs per acre. wonder is available liquid form alsowhoch is totally water soluble and should be sprayed @ 3-4 ml per ltr. of water based on crop requirment to meet nutrients requirment at different stages of crop/plants.

 

dosage will vary based on geo & agro climatic conditions, crop &soil requirement.

à°•à°²à±à°ªà± à°®à±Šà°²à°•à±†à°¤à±à°¤à°• à°®à±à°‚à°¦à±‡ à°¨à°¶à°¿à°‚à°ªà°œà±‡à°¯à°—à°² à°•à°²à±à°ªà± à°¨à°¾à°¶à°¿à°¨à±à°²à±ˆà°¨ à°…à°²à°¾à°•à±à°²à±‹à°°à± à°Žà°•à°°à°¾à°•à± à°’à°• à°²à±€à°Ÿà°°à± à°²à±‡à°¦à°¾ à°ªà±†à°‚à°¡à°¿à°®à°¿à°§à°¾à°²à°¿à°¨à± 30% à°‡.à°¸à°¿ à°Žà°•à°°à°¾à°•à± 1.30-1.60 à°²à±€. à°šà±Šà°ªà±à°ªà±à°¨ 200 à°²à±€à°Ÿà°°à±à°²à± à°¨à±€à°Ÿà°¿à°²à±‹ à°•à°²à°¿à°ªà°¿ à°µà°¿à°¤à±à°¤à°¿à°¨ à°µà±†à°‚à°Ÿà°¨à±‡ à°—à°¾à°¨à°¿ à°²à±‡à°¦à°¾ 2-3 à°°à±‹à°œà±à°² à°²à±‹à°ªà± à°¨à±‡à°²à°ªà±ˆ à°ªà°¿à°šà°¿à°•à°¾à°°à°¿ à°šà±‡à°¸à±à°•à±‹à°µà°¾à°²à°¿. à°µà°¿à°¤à±à°¤à°¿à°¨ 25-30 à°°à±‹à°œà±à°² à°¦à°¶à°²à±‹ à°—à±Šà°°à±à°°à±à°¤à±‹ à°…à°‚à°¤à°°à°•à±ƒà°·à°¿ à°šà±‡à°¸à±à°•à±‹à°µà°¾à°²à°¿ à°®à°°à°¿à°¯à± à°®à±Šà°•à±à°•à°² à°®à±Šà°¦à°³à±à°³à°•à± à°®à°Ÿà±à°Ÿà°¿à°¨à°¿ à°Žà°—à°¦à±‹à°¯à°¾à°²à°¿. à°µà°¿à°¤à±à°¤à°¿à°¨à°¿ 45 à°°à±‹à°œà±à°² à°µà°°à°•à± à°Žà°²à°¾à°‚à°Ÿà°¿ à°•à°²à±à°ªà± à°²à±‡à°¡à±à°‚à°¡ à°šà±‚à°¸à°¿ à°…à°Ÿà±à°ªà±ˆ à°Žà°²à°¾à°‚à°Ÿà°¿ à°…à°‚à°¤à°° à°¸à±‡à°¦à±à°¯à°‚ à°šà±‡à°¯à°•à±‚à°¡à°¦à± à°²à±‡à°¨à°¿à°šà±‹ à°Šà°¡à°²à± à°¦à±†à°¬à±à°¬à°¤à°¿à°¨à°¿ à°¦à°¿à°—à±à°¬à°¡à±à°²à± à°¤à°—à±à°—à±à°¤à°¾à°¯à°¿.

à°ªà°‚à°Ÿ à°µà°¿à°¤à±à°¤à°¨ 20 à°°à±‹à°œà±à°² à°µà°°à°•à± à°•à°²à±à°ªà± à°¤à±€à°¯à°¡à°¾à°¨à°¿à°•à°¿ à°µà±€à°²à±à°•à°¾à°¨à°¿ à°ªà°°à°¿à°¸à±à°¥à°¿à°¤à±à°²à°²à±‹ à°ªà±ˆà°°à±à°²à±‹ à°®à±Šà°²à°šà°¿à°¨ à°•à°²à±à°ªà±à°¨à± (à°µà±‡à°¡à°²à±à°ªà°¾à°•à± à°®à°°à°¿à°¯à± à°—à°¡à±à°¡à°¿à°œà°¾à°¤à°¿) 2-3 à°†à°•à±à°² à°¦à°¶à°²à±‹ à°‰à°¨à±à°¨à°ªà±à°ªà±à°¡à± à°‡à°®à°¾à°œà°¿à°¤à°¾à°«à±ˆà°°à± 10% à°Žà°•à°°à°¾à°•à± 300 à°®à°¿.à°²à±€. à°²à±‡à°¦à°¾ à°‡à°®à°¾à°œà°¾à°®à°¾à°•à±à°¸à± 35% + à°‡à°®à°¾à°œà°¿à°¤à°¾ à°ªà±ˆà°°à± 35% à°¡à°¬à±à°²à±.à°œà°¿ à°•à°²à±à°ªà± à°®à°‚à°¦à±à°¨à± 40 à°—à±à°°à°¾. à°Žà°•à°°à°¾à°•à± à°šà±Šà°ªà±à°ªà±à°¨ 200 à°²à±€à°Ÿà°°à±à°²à± à°¨à±€à°Ÿà°¿à°¤à±‹ à°•à°²à°¿à°ªà°¿ à°ªà°¿à°šà°¿à°•à°¾à°°à°¿ à°šà±‡à°¸à°¿ à°…à°¨à±à°¨à°¿ à°•à°²à±à°ªà± à°®à±Šà°•à±à°•à°²à°¨à± à°¨à°¿à°µà°¾à°°à°¿à°‚à°šà°µà°šà±à°šà±à°¨à±.

QueryText: farmer asked query on wild boar management in groundnut
KccAns: usage: mix 500ml ecodon in 40 litres of water to make a solution. dip a jute or cotton rope into this solution and tie it around the farm or garden. spray plain water onto this rope once in a week in order to retain moisture. wild pigs and rodents will run away unable to withstand the smell of ecodon solution.

QueryText: farmer asked query on application method of gypsum  in groundnut?

recommended to applay gypsum-200 kgs / acre

QueryText: shaked 400 ml propaquizafop-imazethapyr information ?
KccAns:
technical name	propaquizafop 2.5% + imazethapyr 3.75% mw
target herbs / weeds	grassy weeds: digitaria sanguinalis, dactyloctenium aegyptium, echinochloa colonum, eleusina indica. broad leaf weeds: euphorbia hirta, commelina benghalensis, digera arvensis, amaranthus viridus
major crops	soyabean
dose / acre	800 ml/acre
appropriate spray time	the optimum time of application is 15 days after transplanting. it works best when applied at 2-3 leaf stages.
mode of action	early post herbicide: it works on weeds that have already grown and are at an early stage.
company name	adama india pvt. ltd.

QueryText: novaluron 5.25% + indoxacarb 4.5% sc insecticide uses
KccAns:
technical content: novaluron 5.25% + indoxacarb 4.5% w/w sc

description: 
plethora is an innovative crop protection product with a dual mode of action.

it is a broad-spectrum lepidopteran insecticide.

plethora attacks the insect nervous system by preventing sodium ions entry into nerve cells.

it retard moulting & also paralyzes the insect. plethora acts as a chitin synthesis inhibitor.

it has a phytotoxic effect on the crop.

target pests: helicoverpa, spodoptera, fall armyworm, cut worm, pod borers, dbm, stem borers, bollworms, leaf roller.

dosage: 2 ml/ l

QueryText: farmer asked query on buprofezin 15% + acephate 35% features and benefits:
KccAns:
piranha insecticide, one of the mixing partners of buprofezin (contact action), is an insect growth regulator (igr), which inhibits the chitin synthesis of immature insects and disrupts their normal growth.

coromandel piranha is another mixing partner. acephate is a systemic and contact-action insecticide that increases the enzyme acetylcholine(ach), resulting in paralysis and death of the target insect.

piranha insecticide works quicker, and its long-lasting effect helps manage bph and wbph in rice crops.

like piranha (buprofezin 15% + acephate 35% wp), the molecules are also available separately as ninja (buprofezin 25% sc) and ortain (acephate 75% sp) from coromandel.

QueryText: farmer asked query on  difenthiuron uses
KccAns:
difenthiuron uses-
it is a broad spectrum insecticide which controls whiteflies, aphids, jassids & thrips in cotton, diamond black moth (dbm) in cabbage, mites in chilli & whiteflies in brinjal. spectrum of action and uses: it controls nymphs and adults and gives longer lasting control.

QueryText: farmer asked query on how long does nano dap fertilizer take to work?
KccAns: dap is generally applied as a basal dose before sowing. the earliest seed germination is not earlier than 6 days and roots are initiated. nitrogen does not stay in soil beyond 36-48 hrs.

QueryText: yuvan insecticide information ?
KccAns:
technical name: fipronil 40% + imidacloprid 40% wg
 

features:
effective on all stages of sucking insects through contact and systemic action.
affects transmission system. (nerve cells of insects).
dual action against pests (systemic & ingestion/contact)
longer duration of control.
pgr effect leads to better root growth & thereby increases the yields.
 

use recommendations:
crop	pest	dosage (gm/acre)
sugarcane	white grub	175-200
groundnut	white grub	100-120
